LanguageData.CAL_AdvancedAlloys.label: advanced alloys
LanguageData.CAL_AdvancedAlloys.description: Research more advanced alloys. -Unlocks Black Steel and Plastin.
LanguageData.CAL_DecorativeAlloys.label: decorative alloys
LanguageData.CAL_DecorativeAlloys.description: Research alloying metals for decorative purposes. -Unlocks Brass, Chrome-plated Steel, Aurichalcum, Sterling Silver, Rose Gold, and Electrum.
LanguageData.CAL_UtilityAlloys.label: utility alloys
LanguageData.CAL_UtilityAlloys.description: Research alloying metals for utility purposes. -Unlocks Plumchalcum, Duralumin, Zamak, Bismuth Bronze, Bronze, Cupronickel, Stainless Steel, and Hepatzion.
